chav1961.purelib.basic

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.basic.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object

    This class contains implementation of the useful actions in the system

    Since:
    0.0.1 last update 0.0.2
    Author:
    chav1961@mail.ru
    See Also:
    JUnit tests

      • copyStream

        public static long copyStream(InputStream is,
                              OutputStream os)
                       throws IOException

        Copy one byte stream to another

        Parameters:
        is - input stream to copy from
        os - output stream to copy to
        Returns:
        length transferred (in bytes)
        Throws:
        IOException - if any I/O exception was thrown
        IllegalArgumentException - when any problems with parameters

      • copyStream

        public static int copyStream(Reader is,
                             Writer os)
                      throws IOException

        Copy one character stream to another

        Parameters:
        is - input stream to copy from
        os - output stream to copy to
        Returns:
        length transferred (in chars)
        Throws:
        IOException - if any I/O exception was thrown
        NullPointerException - when any problems with parameters

      • copyStream

        public static int copyStream(CharacterSource is,
                             CharacterTarget os)
                      throws NullPointerException,
                             ContentException,
                             PrintingException

        Copy one character source stream to another

        Parameters:
        is - input source stream to copy from
        os - output target stream to copy to
        Returns:
        length transferred (in chars)
        Throws:
        ContentException - error reading source chars
        PrintingException - error writing target chars
        NullPointerException - when any problems with parameters
        Since:
        0.0.2

      • mkMap

        public static Map<String,Object> mkMap(Object... parameters)

        Build the Map<String,Object> map from the variable arguments list. Argument list need be a set of key/value pairs. Type of the 'key' parameter is always String, type of the 'value' parameter can be any (including null as value)

        Parameters:
        parameters - key/value pairs to parse.
        Returns:
        map built. Can be empty but not null.

public static <T> Set<T> mkSet(Class<T> content,
                                             T... parameters)

        Build a set of the given type from the parameter's list

        Type Parameters:
        T - any class to make set instances from
        Parameters:
        content - class of the set content
        parameters - parameters to add to set
        Returns:
        set created with the given parameters

                                  throws NullPointerException,
                                         IllegalArgumentException

        Define wrapper class for the primitive type

        Parameters:
        clazz - class to define wrapper for
        Returns:
        wrapper for the primitive type
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when class is null
        IllegalArgumentException - when class is not a primitive class

        Throws:

      • canServeURI

        public static boolean canServeURI(URI uri,
                                  URI template)
                           throws NullPointerException,
                                  IllegalArgumentException

        Does the resource URI can be served by the given URI resource template

        Parameters:
        uri - uri to check
        template - resource template to compare with. Template must be absolute and contains valid scheme and subScheme
        Returns:
        true if can
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument ia null
        IllegalArgumentException - if template doesn't appropriates with the template constraints

      • containsNestedURI

        public static boolean containsNestedURI(URI uri)
                                 throws NullPointerException

        Test that given URI contains nested URI. NEsted URI is any URI in the scheme-specific part, terminated with exclamation mark (!)

        Parameters:
        uri - uri to test
        Returns:
        true if the given uri contains nested URI
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if uri is null
        Since:
        0.0.2

      • extractNestedURI

        public static URI extractNestedURI(URI uri)
                            throws NullPointerException

        Extract nested URI from the given URI

        Parameters:
        uri - uri to extract nested URI from
        Returns:
        URI extracted or null if no nested URI inside the given uri instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if uri is null
        Since:
        0.0.2
        See Also:
        containsNestedURI(URI)

      • extractPathInNestedURI

        public static URI extractPathInNestedURI(URI uri)
                                  throws NullPointerException

        Extract path in the nested uri. Path in the nested URI is all path content after last exclamation mark (!)

        Parameters:
        uri - uri to extract path from
        Returns:
        path extracted or null if no nested URI inside the given uri instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if uri is null
        Since:
        0.0.2
        See Also:
        containsNestedURI(URI)

        public static boolean deleteDir(File dir)

        Delete directory content and directory self.

        Parameters:
        dir - directory to delete
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successful
        Since:
        0.0.2
